snippet: The Pentagon needs to address its unfounded prohibition on transgender people.
abstract: Editorial calls for Defense Sec Chuck Hagel to lift policy prohibiting transgender people from serving in military; cites evidence showing that, as with gay service members, there is no compelling rationale, medical or otherwise, for banning their service; says issue is not whether transgender people can be of service in military, but rather those that are serving must cover up their identities.
lead_paragraph: The Pentagon needs to address its unfounded prohibition on transgender people.
